procedures.term_text: Follow up with me in 1 to 2 weeks to check on his progress
If symptoms have not improved, discuss further treatment options including lithotripsy

medications_and_treatments.term_text: oxycodone 5 mg every 6 to 8 hours for pain
Tylenol between the oxycodone doses for any breakthrough pain

tests.term_text: CT scan of the abdomen revealed a stone that is measuring 0.5 cm located in the proximal right ureter
BMP, urinalysis, and urine culture to evaluate for any signs of infection

clinical_narrative.term_text: MSK: Examination of the abdomen: No pain with palpation of the abdomen. No rebound or guarding. There is CVA tenderness on the right side.
